en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.checkProgress:
Hold up! 
 You have saved progress! 
If you continue, you will lose your progress! 
Would you like to continue?
en.Level1Line1: Welcome to the space program Cadet! I will be your Instructor before you get into orbit!
en.Level1Line2: Every space cadet needs to start on the basics before they get their space wings! That's what I'm here to teach you!
en.Level1Line3: It's super important for <color=#F9DD3B>astronauts</color> to know their Physics! How's your Newton's Third law of Motion?
en.Level1Line4: Let's Start with the basics. Newton's Third Law of Motion refers to the principle that every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
en.Level1Line5: In other words, for every force exerted on an object, there is an equal and opposite force exerted back on the object.
en.Level1Line6: Let's see an example of this in action! Use the <color=#F9DD3B>LAUNCH</color> button to try and collect the token and land safely back on the landing pad!

jp.readyToPlay: あなたは遊ぶ準備ができていますか？
jp.pressContinue: 続行するには '次へ'ボタンを押してください。
